lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins haven't lost consecutive games in regulation for more than a year. Coach Mike Sullivan has a pretty good theory about one of the reasons why: He happens to have the best player on the planet at his disposal in star center Sidney Crosby.

headline.print_headline: Crosby Scores 24th, Penguins Top Struggling Devils 4-1
headline.main: Crosby Scores 24th, Penguins Top Struggling Devils 4-1
